title: Stephen Takes Audience Questions [Exclusive]
description:
Every night before the show, our host takes a few questions from the audience. In this never-before-heard podcast exclusive, Stephen offers extensive advice on heartbreak, loss, artichoke relish, and fairytales.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
